akn:content.akn:p: § 2646. Retrial or rehearing After the Court of International Trade has rendered a judgment or order, the court may, upon the motion of a party or upon its own motion, grant a retrial or rehearing, as the case may be. A motion of a party or the court shall be made not later than thirty days after the date of entry of the judgment or order. (Added Pub. L. 96–417, title III, § 301, Oct. 10, 1980, 94 Stat. 1739.)
